topics.body:
Okay. Summer is coming up. So that means sun, fun, and Squiggy not having a lot to do. So that being said, I am wiping my anime backlog completely clean. I have my notepad and pen right here. So the first ten people to PM me are each gonna recommended an anime to me. But first let’s lay down some ground rules.

1) The anime can’t be over thirty episodes long. I have to get through this shit quick and move on.

2) No OVAs or Films. That would make it too easy.

3) No porn. This is self-explanatory.

4) It can’t be an anime I have watched before. To give some examples of what I’ve watched, Attack on Titan, Cowboy Bebop, Samurai Champloo, Sword Art Online, Gurren Lagann, Kill la Kill, Dance in the Vampire Bund, Accel Saga, Princess Tutu.


So now you’re free to go nuts!

Update: I still have five slots available.
topics.author: 4fde4618945b700aa0002fff

topics.body:
"@SquiggyBomb":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/5509b155636872058fb30b00#post_5509b155636872058fb30b00
There is this interesting show called *Bob the Bizarre Builder.*

Its about this guy name Bob and he has the power to Build things in the blink of en eye.

But one day this evil man call Joe the lawsuit threatened to put his company to ruins and shut them down.

Now Bob and his friends have to journey to New York in order to stop Joe from destroying all he knows dear.

The last episode has the sickest fight ever where joe Smash's Bob with a Giant Nuc plant.
